tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ****** ****** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ** ******* All my family members have been treated for some or the other Dental issues there. The doctors are very friendly. Tooth extraction or tooth surgery is very daunting and painful procedure but at Dr. Vora's it has been a painless experience. Dr. Darshan Vora's famous lines while he extracts teeth are "no pain only pressure". When a tooth is extracted usually one has a big swelling and experience pain. But at Vora's the extraction is done so efficiently one experiences only minor swelling and slight discomfort for 24 hours and then one will be perfect the next day. Recently I visited the clinic for my teeth implants and it was a good experience. All the staff, doctors, nurses, receptionists are very helpful. I have been visiting Dr. Vora's since I was child and I recommend their service. The fees can be slightly high but it's totally worth it. I have tried other Dental clinics as well but the the treatment was not at par with what's offered at Dr. Vora's.
reply_text:
Thank you so much, Jael for the nice words of appreciation. We really strive hard to give best dental treatment experience and full value of treatment fees they pay us. We are excited to know you had painless tooth extraction and immediate dental implants. We promise you for the outstanding new smile and best dental treatment as always üòä
Thank you once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Vora's ********* *** expertise is remarkable.  When he extracted my tooth, I did not feel any pain at all.  The procedure went extremely well.  I did not even know my tooth was extracted until he told me.  I did not experience any pain after the procedure also.  Now it is almost 24 hours, I am feeling great.  Dr.  Vora is a very skilled doctor.  I will enthusiastically recommend him to anybody.
He also possess a wonderful sense of humor that put you at ease.

review:
I can not speak highly of Dr Darshan he is a very genuine person 
We are very grateful to our close friend who brought us to this wonderful clinic.
We travelled from New Zealand to have dental treatment done at another clinic in Mumbai but we were not happy.
From the very first time we met with Dr Darshan we felt very comfortable he explained the entire procedure to us.
He is very professional, gentle and has been  considerate during the entire treatment.
We cannot thank enough him and all the whole team for their exceptional service.
We will be very happy to recommend Dr Darshan and his clinic to all our family and friends in New Zealand to get their dental treatment here at this wonderful clinic.
Vinod and Kalpana Patel

review: Scheduled appointment complied. Quality treatment very well satisfied. Team at clinic is well mannered & etiquette

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The experience has been pathetic. I had visited with severe pain on Sunday, the doctor just immediately asked tondo an X ray and after that she said the tooth needs root canal and said that will solve the issue. From Monday some other doctor started treatment and after drilling my teeth to almost 90% (visual part), she says it could be possible that after root canal also u may have to remove this tooth, do u want to go ahead. I asked her why was this not informed to me during consultation or at least the doc should have said, we can start root canal but will know during the treatment if this will be successful but nothing of that was explained. The owner defends the lack of procedure followed by the team and says I have not taken the technical feedback from Doctor. Very unprofessional team and very disappointed **** **** ******* ******** ** ******** * ********* *** ****** ***** ** *** *** ***** Highly not recomended.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After removal of both the tooth I was asked to pay Rs. 2500/- and then a slip was handed over to me with some instructions. Medicines were not prescribed nor reason for non prescription was explained. I was not told whether any stitches were done or not. My two tooth including a wisdom tooth was removed and I was asked to go home while my mouth was still bleeding and I could hardly speak due to blood and saliva in my mouth.  

When I first went for consultation for a broken tooth an X-ray was taken there itself and  I was asked to pay Rs. 750/- which I paid in cash but I was not given any bill and on 25/2/20 after removing the two tooth I  paid the asked fees of Rs. 2500/- via debit card but no bill was given. 

Hospital / Clinic is well maintained and hygiene appeared to be OK and Doctors are also OK.

Dr Vora made me feel comfortable immediately on our first meeting. He explained my dental issues, procedures, treatments, costs etc step-by-step in simple easy to understand language. 
The surgery has all x-ray and scan facilities on site, so I did not need to run around the city looking for test labs. 
The clinic facilities are very clean and modern. 
The support and admin staff were very friendly and helpful. They even arranged to call an OLA cab for me to return home.

Thanks, Dr. Darshan!
